entries.journal_entry_description: At the whim of Gethzerion, scout several areas and report the activities of the Singing Mountain Clan.
entries.journal_entry_title: Scout the Singing Mountain Clan's Activities
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go out to the Stone Tower at -443, -1148 and see what is there.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Go to the Floating Rocks and see what
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Travel out to the Old Ceremonial Site at 1067, -4487 and find out if anything is happening there.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Go out to the Old Ceremonial Site
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: You were ambushed by 2 Singing Mountain Clan Sentries!  Kill them!
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Go out to the floating rocks at 2996, -5143 and discover what is going on there.
entries.task05_journal_entry_title: Go to Another Set of Floating Rocks
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Return to the Science Center and tell the Nightsister Slave what happened.
entries.task07_journal_entry_title: Reward for a Job Well Done
